encoder.name: ASCII Value Shift Cipher
encoder.author: Thomas Shaw
encoder.description: Shifts ASCII characters by numerical value via a numerical shift_key. Rotating between standard ASCII characters values 32(' ') to 126('~').
encoder.hint: Encoded with a rotation cipher based on the ASCII value using a random key. Uses the 94 printable ascii characters.
encoder.solution: Decoding tools are available online e.g. http://www.dcode.fr/rot-cipher
